cross: Paphiopedilum Space Shuttle x Paphiopedilum Memoria Sabrina Mark

measurements.description: One full flower on one 18-cm inflorescence; dorsal sepal white, light green basally, large thick dark burgundy spots, plentiful centrally; synsepal white overlaid chartreuse, dark burgundy spots lined vertically; petals chartreuse, overlaid mahogany, thick dark burgundy spots basally; pouch chartreuse, overlaid mahogany, rimmed chartreuse; staminode chartreuse, lightly spotted burgundy; substance firm; texture waxy.
